fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot be given notifications, nor join any Mafia, Coven, Vampire, Locust, etc. chat. The respective factions will furthermore not be told of your existence.
- You will copy the goal, abilities, and additional attributes of another role. You won't know what you got, though :D
- You may visit people, even if you weren't given an ability that would give that visit an effect.
